ModMetaData.name: HalloweenParade(continued)
ModMetaData.author: hana_asagi
ModMetaData.description:
リムワールドにハロウィンのおばけ達を追加します。ハロウィンのお菓子を落とすカボチャ3種、美味しい秋の収穫を落とすコウモリ達と歩くキノコ、周囲の温度を下げるゴースト、ろうそくを置いてまわるカカシ、こわーい死神さん。全部で8種。 Living pumpkins, scary cute bats, bouncy mushrooms, and even ghosts! Halloween has truly come to the Rim; and, with all the different solar systems it has, it’s always Halloween on some planet, right? But these little baddies aren’t just here for pranks, they’re also pretty sweet: colonists harvest various sweets from three different breeds of living pumpkins; mushrooms and bats also have some goodies to share; scarecrows help keep the dark away by placing down candles ; ghosts keep it cool by lowering the temperature of whatever room they’re in; and reapers, well, like the ghosts, they can help carry the load in a caravan. In total, this mod introduces 8 animals. Have fun, and happy Halloween!
description translation by ManOfGod413 (Thank you!) In this MOD, English is written in machine translation. Redistribution of images and XML files is prohibited. Image processing is prohibited.
